instructions: In the Beats app for Android, display the screen for your connected device , then tap Rename. You may need to scroll to see the Rename button. Do one of the following: Enter a custom name: Delete the current name, then enter a new name. (Tap the blinking cursor, then drag the handle below the text field to position the cursor.) Let the Beats app suggest a name: Tap Generate a name. Keep tapping until you find a name you like. After you assign the perfect name to your Beats device, tap Done on the Android phone s keyboard.
